name: Jellyfin Media Server
description: Ensures the Jellyfin media server container is running and responding on port 8096.
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then if docker ps --filter 'name=jellyfin' --filter 'status=running' --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -qE '^jellyfin$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker start jellyfin 2>/dev/null || docker restart jellyfin 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 5; if curl -fs --max-time 5 http://localhost:8096/System/Ping 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'Jellyfin'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
